Press and hold the Power key. Tap Restart .
Tap the Recent Apps key. Tap Task Manager . A list of active applications appears. Tap End to close an app. Tap End all to close all apps.
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under APPLICATIONS , tap Application manager . Swipe right to the RUNNING screen. View the free value.
